member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InterpolatedStringHandlerAttribute
member.summary: Indicates the attributed type is to be used as an interpolated string handler.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InterpolatedStringHandlerArgumentAttribute
member.summary: Indicates which arguments to a method involving an interpolated string handler should be passed to that handler.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InterpolatedStringHandlerArgumentAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the argument that should be passed to the handler.
member.remarks: may be used as the name of the receiver in an instance method.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InterpolatedStringHandlerArgumentAttribute.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The names of the arguments that should be passed to the handler.
member.remarks: may be used as the name of the receiver in an instance method.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InterpolatedStringHandlerArgumentAttribute.Arguments
member.summary: Gets the names of the arguments that should be passed to the handler.
member.remarks: may be used as the name of the receiver in an instance method.
